text: Marco Benfatto (born 6 January 1988) is an Italian professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Major results== ;2012 : 1st Stage 1 Giro del Friuli-Venezia Giulia : 1st Stage 2a Giro Ciclistico d'Italia ;2013 : 2nd Riga Grand Prix : 3rd Poreč Trophy : 4th Trofej Umag : 4th Jūrmala Grand Prix : 10th Race Horizon Park 1 ;2014 : Tour of Qinghai Lake ::1st Stages 2 & 4 : 1st Stage 5 Tour de Normandie : 9th Overall Tour of China II ;2016 : 1st 20px Overall Tour of China II ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stages 1, 4 & 5 : Tour of China I ::1st Points classification ::1st Stages 1, 2 & 6 : Tour of Bihor ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stages 2 & 3 ;2017 : Tour of China II ::1st Stages 3 & 4 : 1st Stage 5 Tour of China I : 9th La Roue Tourangelle ;2018 : Tour of China I ::1st Stages 3 & 5 : 1st Stage 7 Tour of Hainan : 1st Stage 4 Vuelta a Venezuela ;2019 : Tour of China I ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stage 1 & 5 : Tour of China II ::1st Stage 1 & 2 : Tour of Taihu Lake ::1st Stages 1 & 6 : 1st Stage 1 Vuelta al Táchira : 1st Stage 8 Tour de Langkawi ;2020 : 5th Trofej Umag ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:People from Camposampiero Category:Sportspeople from Veneto
title: Marco Benfatto
